00060   inline void init(int argc, char *argv[], const Desc *desc = NULL,
00061                    const Desc *hidden = NULL, const PositionalDesc *p = NULL) {
00062     System::initialize(System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]));
00063     if (desc) description(*desc);
00064     init_default_options();
00065     parse_args(argc, argv, desc, hidden, p);
00066     init_default_actions();
00067   }
